Title: Establishes the "right to home inspection act"
Summary: Establishes the right to inspection of homes by buyers; provides for a 10-day inspection period where the buyer has the right to have a home inspected and cancel the contract if the buyer is not satisfied with the inspection results; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd Art 14 Art Head, §§461 & 462, add §467, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to enacting the "right to home inspection act"
